1.7.name: wordpress/show-wordpress-blog-vital-stats
1.7.description:
Simple WordPress Stats Plugin to show Google Page Rank, Alexa rank, Twitter follower count, Technorati rank, Number of Posts, Number of Comments, Trackbacks and pingbacks, Feedburner count etc. anywhere on your wordpress blog to show off to your visitors.

You can show the vital blog stats and chicklets in a sidebard widget just by using a shortcode.

If you don't want the hassle of updating your 'Advertise Here' page of your blog every few days with the important statistics then this plugin will come in handy

For information and updates, please visit the WP Vital Blog Stats Plugin Page.
